name: KORG DS-10 PLUS
description:
KORG DS-10 PLUS is an enhanced version of the revolutionary KORG DS-10 synthesizer software for Nintendo DS. The original KORG DS-10 music-creation software, which combined the superior interface of the Nintendo DS with the functionality of the famous MS-10 synthesizer, has been optimized to essentially double the power of the original when used with the Nintendo DSi system.

Features

• Improved professional-grade music tool software at a greater cost performance value than the original KORG DS-10.
• Optimized for Nintendo DSi for 12-voice polyphony and to double the power of the original KORG DS-10: 4 analog synthesizer tracks and 8 dedicated drum tracks, increasing the total number of individual tracks from 6 to 12 (feature available only for the Nintendo DSi).
• SONG mode revamped for expanded song composition capabilities and real-time performance. Per track MUTE/SOLO built into the SONG mode, and EDIT/PLAY enabled for all modes within the SONG mode to further improve real-time performance.
• Delay, chorus, and flanger sound effects available from the mixing board.
• Three different note-entry modes: Touch Screen control, keyboard screen, and matrix screen.
• Exchange sounds and songs and play with up to eight systems simultaneously through a local wireless communications link.
